name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with stress testing, AI integration, and comprehensive export functionality
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: Professional UI redesign with glass-effect cards
Comprehensive summary panel with inflation analysis
Dynamic partner charts with real-time updates
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
majorChanges: Advanced stress testing with 5 economic scenarios
Claude AI integration for custom scenarios
Real-time stock price API with multiple fallbacks
Comprehensive export system (image, PDF, AI analysis)
Summary panel with inflation impact analysis
